text: Sarpedon () was a coastal town of ancient Cilicia, mentioned by the anonymous author of the Periplus of Pseudo-Scylax as abandoned in his time ().Periplus of Pseudo-Scylax 102. Its site is likely located near Cape Sarpedonion (Incekum Burnu) in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Sarpedon (Cilicia)
